title: Name a time when Aatrox would be a good pick
body:
Need a drain tank? Pick Hecarim or WW. Maybe even Sion.
Need a splitpusher/duelist? Pick Jax or Irelia
Need CC? Pick Maokai or Malphite or Sion.
Need a damage soak? Mundo, Sion, or basically any of the champions I listed before

All of the aforementioned champions are better than Aatrox at all stages of the game too. They're tankier, do more damage, and are safer in lane because they can abuse flask/tp.

Please buff Aatrox
